titles.title: To amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide that Alexander Creek, Alaska, is and shall be recognized as an eligible Native village under that Act, and for other purposes.
To amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide that Alexander Creek, Alaska, is and shall be recognized as an eligible Native village under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources
